title.narrative: EFFECTIVE/CHILD FRIENDLY SCHOOLS

description.narrative: By 2016 duty bearers in 8 countries have increased capacity, supported with policy frameworks, to employ positive disciplinary and learning practices in student-centred teaching and learning environments within school effectiveness/child friendly schools framework, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Evaluation And Research, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, all girls and boys in 12 Eastern Caribbean countries benefit from rights-based laws, policies, programmes and institutions that provide equitable systems for positive development, lifelong learning and protection
